title: Butcher's Chainsaw
summaries: The Butcher's Chainsaw is a Hardmode, post-Plantera chainsaw that, upon striking an enemy or critter, emits 1–4 sparks akin to the projectiles produced by the Wand of Sparking, dealing damage to nearby enemies as well. The Butcher's Chainsaw's sparks pierce up to two enemies, deal 50% of the weapon's damage (60 base damage), and inflict 20% of its knockback (base knockback of 1.6 (Very weak)). Sparks also have a 1/2 (50%) chance to inflict the Hellfire debuff onto damaged enemies for 1–4 seconds. The Butcher's Chainsaw has a 1/40 (2.5%) / 3/80 (3.75%) chance to drop from Butchers during the Solar Eclipse event.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.
